source:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Callea is at her wits' end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ジョッブ砦のカレアは、途方に暮れているようだ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_01<tab>The young Callea shares with you her plight. As she tells it, her father Colphas─proprietor of the infirmary you visited─is dead, slain by a vile sin eater at Holminster Switch. She would share the sad news with Nielden, a close friend of her father's who made a promise to look after the girl in the event of tragedy, but fears that she would never survive the trip to his distant and dangerous post. With a smile, you tell the girl you would be more than happy to travel to Radisca's Round in her stead.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

カレアから、父の訃報を伝えるよう頼まれた。レイクランドのラディスカ物見塔にいる「ニールデン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_02<tab>At Radisca's Round, Nielden is devastated to hear the news about his friend, but thanks you for sharing it with him. He states that while he would like nothing more than to dash to Callea's side, he first must find someone to cover his post in his absence. As he is on active duty, he asks that you make the request with his superior─one Captain Mynes─on his behalf.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_02<tab>ニールデンから、物見塔の上官に事情を説明するよう頼まれた。ラディスカ物見塔にいる「マインズ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_03<tab>Captain Mynes is disheartened to hear of the loss of one of the most skilled and beloved physicians in the realm. He is quick to grant Nielden's request for a leave of absence to tend to Callea, no doubt a testament to the great respect the girl's father granted. Return and share the good news with the gentle Galdjent guard.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_03<tab>マインズに事情を説明した。分隊長は、ニールデンが持ち場を離れることを許可してくれた。ラディスカ物見塔にいる「ニールデン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_04<tab>Nielden is relieved to hear of Captain Mynes's generosity, but remains disheartened over the loss of Colphas. He shares with you some more recollections of his fallen friend, and reaffirms his commitment to go to the side of the daughter Colphas left behind. For your part, you resolve to offer what support you can.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_SEQ_04<tab>ニールデンにマインズの言葉を伝えた。ニールデンはコルファスの死を悔やんでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nielden at Radisca's Round.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_TODO_00<tab>ラディスカ物見塔のニールデンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_000<tab>Oh, dear... Whatever am I to do?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_000<tab>あぁ、いったいこれからどうすれば……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_001<tab>Hm...? Forgive me, I didn't see you there. You have come seeking treatment, I presume? I'm afraid we're not taking in any new patients at the moment...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_001<tab>……ハッ！　す、すみません。
患者さんでしょうか？
それでしたら、申し訳ないのですが、どうかお引取りを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_002<tab>Hm? You're not ailing, you say? I'm sorry, I simply assumed. This is an infirmary, you see. Or rather, I should say...it used to be.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_002<tab>違うのですか？　てっきり、診察にいらしたのかと……
父がこの塔の一角で、診療所を開いていたんです。
もっとも、今は閉めてしまっていますが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_002<tab>My father ran it, you see, but he...he is no longer with us. Devoured by a sin eater at the battle of Holminster Switch, or so I was told. I...I did not even have the chance to say good-bye.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_002<tab>早とちりをしてしまって、申し訳ありません。
先日のホルミンスターの襲撃の折、
父を亡くしたもので……茫然としていたのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_003<tab>And so I am alone in this world now. There is one man─a member of the guard and dear friend of my father's─who promised he would look after me if things came to the worst. But then he was transferred to a distant and dangerous post, and thus I am unable to so much as share with him the unfortunate news.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_003<tab>こんな時に頼りになる父の友人も、
別の衛兵団の拠点に転属になって久しく……
まだ訃報を伝えることも、できていない有様なのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_003<tab>Hmm... You look like someone who can hold <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own in battle. Would you be so kind as to brave the road and convey my message to this man? Of course, I would compensate you well for your efforts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_003<tab>……衛兵の皆さんと同じくらい、いえ、
それ以上に戦い慣れている方とお見受けします。
謝礼をお渡しするので、手を貸していただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_004<tab>The man's name is Nielden, and─gods willing─he still serves at Radisca's Round. Pray seek him out, and tell him that Colphas lives no longer. It pains me to ask a stranger to be the bearer of such grim news, but it would mean everything to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_004<tab>ラディスカ物見塔にいる「ニールデン」という衛兵に、
わたしの父……コルファスの訃報を伝えていただきたいのです。
不躾なお願いで、本当に申し訳ないのですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_004<tab>The road is long, and fraught with danger─I would not get very far on my own. I cannot force you to do this, but...can you find it in your heart to help me?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_100_004<tab>ラディスカ物見塔への道中は魔物が多く、
わたしひとりでは、とても行けそうにありません。
それに、父の遺品整理が残っていて……お願いできますでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_005<tab>Thank you, my friend. I have no words to express my gratitude. My name is Callea...might I ask yours?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_005<tab>ああ、ありがとうございます！
お名前を伺ってもよろしいですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_006<tab>A gentle name, indeed. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...and be safe.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんとおっしゃるのですね。
どうかお気を付けて、よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_007<tab>Pray seek out the guard Nielden at Radisca's Round and tell him that Colphas lives no longer. And thank you, my friend...this means the world to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_CALLEA_000_007<tab>ラディスカ物見塔にいる「ニールデン」という衛兵に、
わたしの父、コルファスが亡くなったと伝えてください。
どうかお気を付けて。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_010<tab>Hm? Somethin' I can do for ye?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_010<tab>ん？　アンタ、オレに何の用だ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_011<tab>The sin eaters got Colphas!? Say it ain't so!
target: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_011<tab>何だと！？　コルファスが死んだ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_012<tab>The bloody fool! How many times did I tell 'im? “Forget that damned battle, and stay home with Callea! The girl needs ye!” But did he listen?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_012<tab>あの野郎……だから無茶をするなと言ったんだ！
カレアをひとり、遺していきやがって……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>Forgive me, friend. It's just...the man was like a brother to me. Anyhow, I'd like nothin' more than to rush to Callea's side with ye, but I can't very well run off like that. 'Least not without findin' someone to cover my post.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>……とにかく事情はわかった。
すぐにでもあの子のところに行ってやりたいが、
このまま勝手に、仕事を抜け出すわけにはいかない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_014<tab>If ye could spare a minute, maybe ye could go have a talk with my superior? Captain Mynes is a stern man, but also a reasonable one. I reckon he wouldn't begrudge me a brief respite to see the girl. After all, she's almost family.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_014<tab>アンタ、すまないが、オレが準備している間に、
上官に事情を説明し、持ち場を離れたいと伝えてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>Can't thank ye enough, friend. You'll find the captain inside the tower. I'd best be getting back to my post. I look forward to hearin' the good word.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>ありがたい、恩に着る！
上官の「マインズ」なら、塔の中にいるはずだ。
あとで合流しよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_020<tab>Colphas, slain by a sin eater!? Are you certain of this!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_020<tab>……そ、それは確かなのか？
あのコルファス殿が、亡くなられたと！？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_021<tab>Truly, this is a sad day for our cause. He was a fine physician─one of the best we had. I've long since lost count of how many men were plucked back from the brink of death by his hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_021<tab>そうか……惜しい人をなくしてしまったものだ。
彼は医者として、多くの衛兵を救ってくれた恩人でな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_022<tab>Aye, he was also one of the bravest men I knew. Though he was no warrior, he did not hesitate to venture beyond the safe walls of the Crystarium and tend to patients on the front lines. It was in this spirit that he chose to establish the infirmary at Fort Jobb.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_022<tab>安全なクリスタリウムではなく、
危険と隣り合わせのジョッブ砦に診療所を構え、
負傷兵を治療したり、薬を作ったりと大いに貢献してくれた。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_023<tab>But he is gone now, and we must carry on without him. As for Nielden's request for a leave of absence, consider it granted. Tell him to do what he must for Colphas's girl. I will see that his post is covered.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_023<tab>……ともかく、事情はわかった。
奴が持ち場を離れることは許可しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_024<tab>In truth, we can ill afford to lose even a single good man at a time like this. And yet, there are certain things that must not be compromised. Tell Nielden he may go to the girl's side with my blessing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_024<tab>この人数で任務を回すのは厳しいが、仕方がない。
こちらのことは気にせず、遺された娘さんを支えるよう、
併せて「ニールデン」に伝えてほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_025<tab>Every day, our numbers dwindle. We can scarcely fend for ourselves as is. Yet I would not think for a moment to begrudge Nielden his request. Tell him to go with my blessing. We will find a way to make do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_MYNES_000_025<tab>こちらのことを気にする必要はない。
すぐに娘さんのところに行くよう、「ニールデン」に伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_030<tab>Oho, there ye are! What's the good word, friend!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_030<tab>おお、アンタか！
こっちはちょうど準備が終わったところだ、そっちはどうだった？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_031<tab>The captain said <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>!? Ahaha! Must be goin' soft in his older age. Figured he'd at least have told me to hurry back...goes to show ye just what people thought of Colphas.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_031<tab>マインズ殿が、そんなことを……！？
急いで戻ってこいと、言われるだろうと思っていたが……
いや、それほどあいつが慕われていたってことだろうな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_032<tab>He was a good man. Treated every patient with dignity and respect, be they prince or pauper. An' he wouldn't think twice about riskin' his own life when others' lives were in danger.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_032<tab>コルファスは、本当にいいヤツだったんだ。
誰に対しても分け隔てなく接して、
怪我人が出たと聞いたら、どこへだって走っていった。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_033<tab>Could barely swing a sword, yet it wouldn't stop him from bravin' monster-infested forests, roads roamed by sin eaters, and the gods know what else. He even showed his face here at the Round from time to time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_033<tab>ろくに戦えもしないのに、
患者を看るために、魔物が出る森を護衛もなしに突っ切って、
物見塔まで駆け付けてきたことも、一度や二度じゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_034<tab>...'Course, that's what did him in in the end. And yet, I reckon he died with no regrets...save for leavin' poor Callea behind to fend for 'erself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_034<tab>そんな調子じゃ、いつか取り返しのつかないことになる。
無茶はやめろ、お前には娘がいるんだからって、
いつも言い聞かせていたんだがな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_035<tab>Anyhow, ye have my thanks, friend. And with that, I'd best prepare to hit the road. There's someone who needs me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE101_03456_NIELDEN_000_035<tab>ともかく、お前さんも、
わざわざ伝令役を担ってくれて、ありがとうよ。
